byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Canada: contributions for tank and plane purchases pour in; Supply Min clears up pub misapprehension on tank bldg
snippet: OTTAWA, May 31--With yesterday's outbreak of partisanship out of its system, the Canadian House of Commons got down to business today. The Liberal majority, who have been on the defensive since the session opened, evidently felt better for having ...

headline.main: CANADA'S ESTIMATE ON WAR COSTS RISES; Commons Takes Action on Bill Authorizing the Refunding of $750,000,000 in Obligations BORROWING IS STRESSED Contributions for Purchase of Tanks and Planes Pouring In on the Government

lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, May 31--With yesterday's outbreak of partisanship out of its system, the Canadian House of Commons got down to business today. The Liberal majority, who have been on the defensive since the session opened, evidently felt better for having been able to let
